title: Cafe De Paris Steak
instructions: Prepare Café de Paris butter: Mix softened butter with curry powder, capers, anchovies (optional), mustard, shallots, and fresh herbs. Roll into a log and refrigerate.
Remove planted.steak from packaging and pat dry. Season generously with salt and pepper.
Heat a cast-iron skillet over high heat until smoking. Add olive oil.
Sear the steak for 3 minutes per side until a deep golden crust forms.
Remove from heat and immediately top with a thick slice of the cold Café de Paris butter.
Let rest for 2 minutes as the butter melts, then serve with frites and a side salad.
